v8:item.v8:content: Data integrity issues have been identified in the application. It is recommended that you resolve them before the update. <link Go to the problem report>View the report</>

Installed extensions are available. Before updating, make sure that the installed extensions are compatible with the new configuration version. It is recommended that you test the update on a backup. <link e1cib/app/General form.Extensions>View extensions</>
Unapplied patches are found in the application. It is recommended that you <link action:reboot>restart the application before the update</>.
The current version is <b><<Version>></>. Select an update option:
Priority when displaying information about available updates
The application will notify you whenever a new version is released.
The application will keep you informed about new builds of the current version during the support period. Even after the support period ends, you will be notified of new version releases.
Install configuration update or patches from file
If you already have a configuration update file or patch files, follow the link to install the configuration update from the file.
Page information about available update for components
Receive patch data, download patches and install them in quiet mode (no manual actions required).
<b>Version <<Number>></> <link S>Migrate to a new platform version</>
Automatic 1C:Enterprise platform update is unavailable in the client/server mode. Manually import and install the new platform version distribution.
Select a directory to save 1C:Enterprise platform distributions
Later you can use the saved platform distributions to install them on other computers.
Install configuration update or patches from file
If you already have a configuration update file or patch files, follow the link to install the configuration update from the file.
Before installing the update, review <link open:V8Update>features of migration</> to this platform version.
Select a directory to save 1C:Enterprise platform distributions
Later you can use the saved platform distributions to install them on other computers.
Platform version <<version>> has already been installed on the computer.
Page completed do not back up
Recommended version of 1C:Enterprise platform: <b><<VersionNew</><b>>></>, Current version: <<VersionCurrent>>
Entered username and password will be saved to the application to connect to all online support services.
Group Cannot connect to service details

Cannot connect to Internet update service to receive update information. Possible reasons: • No Internet connection. • Problems on the web node. • Firewall or another middleware (antivirus, etc.) prevents the application from connecting to the Internet. • Internet connection is executed via proxy server but <link open:ProxySettings>its parameters</> are not set in the application.
For technical details, see <link open:log>Event log</>.

Receiving a distribution file of 1C:Enterprise platform (<Size>). It may take from several minutes to several hours to receive the file depending on the update size, the Internet connection speed and the computer performance.
Update file is successfully received. Follow 1C:Enterprise installer instructions. Execution will be continued automatically once the installation is complete.
Update file is successfully received. Installing a new version of 1C:Enterprise platform.
Installed version: <b><<VersionInstalled>></> Platform distribution package is copied to directory <link S><<DirectoryToSave</>
Completed pages do not create backup
The patches are installed. They will be applied after you restart the application.
<link 1>Other users</> are working with the application. They will see the patches applied the next time they log in.
To continue, read the <link OrderOfUpdate>update procedure</>.
Install the update now (requires restarting the application)
Remind me when I exit the application
The update might take a long time. Do not turn off your computer until the update is completed.
Other users are working with the application. Please close their sessions to continue.
External applications are connected to the application. Please close their connections to continue.
View the list of active connections
Designer is running. Please close Designer to continue.

Collected data contains only technical information. Anonymous statistics will help us improve the application and understand what features are the most expected. You can turn off sending statistics at any moment.
Allow automatic sending of application usage data to 1C Company
Create a temporary infobase backup and roll back if any issues occur
To continue, read the <link OrderOfUpdate>update procedure</>.
Install the update now (requires restarting the application)
Remind me when I exit the application
The update will be installed from this computer in background. Ensure that the computer will be turned on at the scheduled time.
The update might take a long time. Do not turn off your computer until the update is completed.
Other users are working with the application. Their sessions will be terminated automatically.
View the list of active users
Other users and external applications are connected to the infobase. Their sessions will be terminated automatically.
View the list of active connections
It is recommended that you back up the infobase before installing an update.

There are <link DeferredHandlers>additional data processing procedures</> that were not completed during the migration from the previous application version. They will be automatically completed during the update. This might significantly increase the update time.
Allow automatic sending of application usage data to 1C Company

Collected data contains only technical information. Anonymous statistics will help us improve the application and understand what features are the most expected. You can turn off sending statistics at any moment.
Save received platform distribution packages to the directory:
The directory for saving the platform distribution package
Automatically back up and open the application on a new platform version
Working in the application is prohibited
Update date and time are set
Transfer of information to the Monitoring center
Sending messages to technical support is available
View the list of active users
